original_title: German Ambassador and AHK Delegation visits BOI
original_body_lines: The German Ambassador to Sri Lanka Hloger Seubert and AHK Delegation of German Industry and Commerce met with the Board of Investment (BOI) top officials on Monday to discuss challenges faced by industry and potential opportunities for re-investment. Secretary Investment Promotion, BOI Chairman,  Director General and Port City Economic Commission Chief Operating Officer participated in the discussions with the delegation
